Edges-Mummy -- Male Human Legendary Demon
Attributes (13 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d8 Strength: d12+1 Vigor: d12+2
Attribute Notes: The Strength Of Ages: +2 Strength Step/+2 Vigor Step
Skills (16 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d6 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Psionics: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Faith: (spi) d6 Occult: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d6
Fighting: (agi) d6 Performance: (spi) d4 Taunt: (sma) d4
Healing: (sma) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d6 Thievery: (agi) d4
Size: 0
Advances: 16 Improvement Points: 36 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 16; Edge: 16; Skill: 4
Features
Edges (10 points): Burrow; Mummy Rot; Mummy; Mystic Powers (Mummy (Architect)); Mystic Powers (Mummy (Royal)); Regeneration (Fast); Regeneration (Slow); Summon Great Swarm; Summon Storm; Summon Swarm Hindrances: Hesitant; Poverty; Vengeful+ Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Mummy: Has Ageless, Rage, Slow, The Strength Of Ages, Undead, and Weakness (Fire) features
Ageless: Does not age
Poverty: Starts with half funds and loses half of funds each wk
Vengeful+: Seeks revenge by any means
Combat
Parry: 8 (3) Cover: 4 Toughness: 12 (2) Pace/Run: 5/+d4
Armor: Flak Jacket Shield: Riot Shield Weapons: Chainsaw (2d6+4); Holy Water Spray (None R1"); SAW (2d8 R30" AP 2); Unarmed (d12+1+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +3 Parry
Slow: -1 Pace/-1 Run Step
Undead: +2 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Burrow: Burrow Pace 2
Hesitant: Uses the lowest of 2 Action Cards
Mummy Rot: Touch causes a Wound (Vigor neg); death allows using Zombie to convert target into a mummy
Rage: May spend a Benny to gain supernatural powers 1/session; suffers major psychosis afterward (Spirit-2 neg)
Regeneration (Fast): Successful healing removes incapacitation or restores 1 Wound (Raise 2 Wounds) 1/rd
Regeneration (Slow): May make a natural healing roll 1/dy
Undead-1: +2 Shaken recovery/Takes no additional damage from a Called Shot/Ignores 1 point of Wound penalties/Doesn't breathe/Immune to disease and poison
Weakness (Fire): Suffers +4 damage from fire
Arcana
Power Points: 20
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Mystic Powers (Mummy (Architect)): 10 Power Points/May cast Barrier, Detect/Conceal Arcana, Lock/Unlock, or Telekinesis for 2 PP (+2 PP for Raise)
Mystic Powers (Mummy (Royal)): 10 Power Points/May cast Blast, Burst, or Spite for 2 PP (+2 PP for Raise)
Summon Great Swarm: Summoned swarm splits into two medium swarms when slain
Summon Storm: May create a sandstorm several miles in diameter that causes darkness and Fatigue (Vigor or shelter neg)
Summon Swarm: May summon a large swarm of pests 1/dy
